title: Track Player Development on Loan
description: A young player has been sent on loan to another team to get more playing time. A manager needs to track their progress.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player's game statistics from their loan club.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a report of the player's minutes played, goals, and other key stats.

tasks.description: Request and review scouting reports from scouts who have watched the player's games.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews reports on the player's development.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report on the player's loan spell for the head coach.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report concluding that the loan has been successful for the player's development.
